entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
